description: Imports a CSV file and converts to a datatable.

input.name: file
input.description: A file containing a .csv or .tsv formatted data.

input.name: encoding
input.description:
The character encoding of the input `file`.
Defaults to `utf8`.

input.name: delimiter
input.description: Character used as column delimiter. Defaults to "," (comma).

input.name: trim
input.description:
Specifies whether to ignore whitespace characters immediately around the separator.
Defaults to True.

output.name: data
output.description: A DataTable containing columns and rows.
